metadata.title: CVE-2021-27807 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A carefully crafted PDF file can trigger an infinite loop while loading thefile. This issue affects Apache PDFBox version 2.0.22 and prior 2.0.xversions.

criterions.comment: libpdfbox-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
